entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bay Roberts
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023
